item.title: Circle will launch ARC, a Layer1 blockchain focused on stablecoins.
item.description: On August 12th, based on market information, Circle is going to launch ARC, a Layer 1 blockchain that mainly focuses on stablecoins.

item.title: Affected by the Binance Alpha listing, WAI saw a temporary peak surge of 932%
item.description: On August 12th, the World3 project of the AI Agent officially landed on Binance Alpha. After its launch, WAI quickly attracted strong buying interest, with an intraday peak increase of 932%. Meanwhile, WAI has been listed on the spot exchanges of Bitget and KuCoin.World3 is supported by Microsoft for Startups and has received investments from industry capitals such as Ubisoft and Animoca Brands. It aims to build a 24/7 autonomously running Web3 AI workforce. It is reported that the platform has deployed more than 110,000 AI Agents, completed more than 2 million on-chain transactions, and spans various fields such as DeFi, DAO, and GameFi.Industry analysis believes that the AI Agent of World3 has autonomous planning, long-term execution, and multi-chain interaction capabilities. Compared with traditional AI tools, its implementation and scalability are stronger. As the core payment token of the ecosystem, as the platform usage increases, the value capture potential of WAI is worth p

item.title: Radiant Capital Attacker Sells 3091 ETH to Acquire 13.26M DAI
item.description: On August 12th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, the attacker of Radiant Capital sold 3,091 ETH at an average price of $4,291, obtaining 13.26 million DAI. These DAI were then transferred to another wallet. The platform was hacked on October 17, 2024, resulting in a loss of approximately $53 million.

item.title: Affected by the news of a 51% attack on Monero, XMR plummets over 10% in 24 hours
item.description: On August 12th, based on HTX market data, due to the news of the Monero 51% attack, the price of XMR fell by more than 10% within 24 hours and is currently trading at $246.61.Earlier reports showed that Sergey Ivancheglo, the co-founder of IOTA, through his project Qubic, rapidly accumulated a large amount of Monero's mining power via the "useful Proof of Work (uPoW)" mechanism. On August 12th, Qubic briefly controlled 52.72% of Monero's network hashrate (approximately 3.01 GH/s). Once exceeding 51%, Qubic can reject blocks from other mining pools, resulting in chain reorganization, double-spending, or transaction censorship. The Monero community has launched resistance and defense actions, while the Qubic team stated that this was a technical demonstration and not a malicious attack.

item.title: Privacy-focused Cryptocurrency Monero Suffers a 51% Attack, Qubic States the Incident Was a Technical Demonstration and Not a Malicious Attack
item.description: On August 12th, the project Qubic by IOTA co-founder Sergey Ivancheglo rapidly accumulated a substantial amount of Monero mining power through the "useful Proof of Work (uPoW)" mechanism. It surged from less than 2% to over 27% and briefly became the largest Monero mining pool. It openly declared its goal of reaching over 51% to test network security.On August 12th, Qubic briefly controlled 52.72% of the Monero network's hash rate (approximately 3.01 GH/s). Once surpassing 51%, Qubic has the ability to reject blocks from other pools, resulting in chain reorganization, double-spending, or transaction censorship.The Monero community has launched resistance and defense actions. Qubic stated that this was a technical demonstration and not a malicious attack. The CTO of Ledger posted that Monero seems to be facing a successful 51% attack. The Qubic mining pool has been steadily accumulating mining power for months and now controls the majority of the network's mining power. A significan

item.title: Shield Wall: Resupply Attacker has laundered 2280 ETH through Tornado Cash
item.description: Update: On August 12th, as per PeckShield's monitoring, the Resupply attacker has managed to launder 2280 ETH (valued approximately at $9.8 million) by means of Tornado Cash.

item.title: Binance Wallet Exclusive TGE Launch of Cherry AI (AIBOT)
item.description: August 12th. According to official information, Binance Wallet hosted the 33rd exclusive TGE with Cherry AI (AIBOT).· Subscription Period: From 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM on August 14th, 2025 (UTC+8).· Subscription Qualification: Eligible users need to participate by using Alpha Points.An additional 30,000,000 AIBOT will be set aside for future events, and the specific details will be announced later.

item.title: Or 3 addresses belonging to the same whale staked 14,942 ETH and deposited it into Binance
item.description: On August 12th, as monitored by LookOnChain, within the past hour, three addresses (which are likely to belong to the same whale) unbonded 14,942 ETH ($64.38 million) and deposited it into Binance.

item.title: A whale withdrew 500 BTC from Binance 1 hour ago and currently holds a total of 3,000 BTC.
item.description: On August 12th, according to Arkham Monitoring, a whale withdrew 500 BTC from Binance one hour ago. Currently, this address holds a total of 3,000 BTC, which is worth $356 million.

item.title: Analyst: When BTC drops ahead of CPI or PPI data release, it typically sees a quick rebound post-data.
item.description: On August 12th, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented a chart analysis indicating that when BTC declines prior to the release of CPI or PPI data, it generally experiences a rapid rebound after the data is made public, and vice versa.
